content: 1 Paul and Silvanus and Timothy— Unto the assembly of Thessalonians in God our Father and Lord Jesus Christ,— Favour unto you､ and peace!
content_old: 1 Paul and Silvanus and Timothy— Unto the assembly of Thessalonians in God our Father and Lord Jesus Christ,— Favour unto you､ and peace!

content: 2 We are giving thanks unto God continually､ Concerning you all making mention in our prayers,
content_old: 2 We are giving thanks unto God continually､ Concerning you all making mention in our prayers,

content: 3 Unceasingly remembering— Your work of faith And labour of love And endurance of hope of our Lord Jesus Christ, Before our God and Father:
content_old: 3 Unceasingly remembering— Your work of faith And labour of love And endurance of hope of our Lord Jesus Christ, Before our God and Father:

content: 4 Knowing､ brethren beloved by God､ your election|,—
content_old: 4 Knowing､ brethren beloved by God､ your election|,—

content: 5 How that our glad-message came not unto you in word only, But also in power､ And in Holy Spirit､ And in much assurance,— Even as ye know what manner of men we became unto you､ for your sake;
content_old: 5 How that our glad-message came not unto you in word only, But also in power､ And in Holy Spirit､ And in much assurance,— Even as ye know what manner of men we became unto you､ for your sake;

content: 6 And ye became imitators of us and of the Lord, Giving welcome unto the word､ In much tribulation, With joy of Holy Spirit;
content_old: 6 And ye became imitators of us and of the Lord, Giving welcome unto the word､ In much tribulation, With joy of Holy Spirit;

content: 7 So that ye became an ensample unto all who were coming to the faith､ in Macedonia and in Achaia:
content_old: 7 So that ye became an ensample unto all who were coming to the faith､ in Macedonia and in Achaia:

content: 8 From you in fact､ hath sounded forth the word of the Lord— Not only in Macedonia and in Achaia But in every place your faith which is toward God hath gone forth, So that no need have we to be saying anything;
content_old: 8 From you in fact､ hath sounded forth the word of the Lord— Not only in Macedonia and in Achaia But in every place your faith which is toward God hath gone forth, So that no need have we to be saying anything;

content: 9 For they themselves concerning us do tell— What manner of entrance we had unto you, And how ye turned unto God from the idols— To be serving a living and true God､
content_old: 9 For they themselves concerning us do tell— What manner of entrance we had unto you, And how ye turned unto God from the idols— To be serving a living and true God､

content: 1 For yourselves know､ brethren､ our entrance which was unto you—that it hath not proved void;
content_old: 1 For yourselves know､ brethren､ our entrance which was unto you—that it hath not proved void;

content: 2 But though we had previously suffered､ and been insulted､ even as ye know､ in Philippi We waxed bold in our God to speak unto you the glad-message of God with much conflict.
content_old: 2 But though we had previously suffered､ and been insulted､ even as ye know､ in Philippi We waxed bold in our God to speak unto you the glad-message of God with much conflict.

content: 3 For our exhortation is not of error､ nor of uncleanness､ nor in guile,
content_old: 3 For our exhortation is not of error､ nor of uncleanness､ nor in guile,

content: 4 But even as we have been approved by God､ to be entrusted with the glad-message so we speak,— Not as unto men giving pleasure､ But unto God—who proveth our hearts.
content_old: 4 But even as we have been approved by God､ to be entrusted with the glad-message so we speak,— Not as unto men giving pleasure､ But unto God—who proveth our hearts.

content: 5 For neither at any time were we found using words of flattery—even as ye know, Nor a pretext for greed—God is witness!
content_old: 5 For neither at any time were we found using words of flattery—even as ye know, Nor a pretext for greed—God is witness!

content: 6 Nor of men seeking glory—either from you､ or from others, Though we could have assumed dignity as Apostles of Christ;
content_old: 6 Nor of men seeking glory—either from you､ or from others, Though we could have assumed dignity as Apostles of Christ;

content: 7 But we became gentle in your midst,— As though a nursing mother had been cherishing her own children:
content_old: 7 But we became gentle in your midst,— As though a nursing mother had been cherishing her own children:

content: 8 Thus yearning after you we could have been well-pleased to impart unto you— Not only the glad-message of God, But our own lives also,— Because very dear to us had ye become.
content_old: 8 Thus yearning after you we could have been well-pleased to impart unto you— Not only the glad-message of God, But our own lives also,— Because very dear to us had ye become.

content: 9 For ye remember､ brethren､ our toil and hardship: Night and day working､ so as not to be a burden unto any of you We proclaimed unto you the glad-message of God.
content_old: 9 For ye remember､ brethren､ our toil and hardship: Night and day working､ so as not to be a burden unto any of you We proclaimed unto you the glad-message of God.

content: 10 Ye are witnesses—God also, How kindly and righteously and blamelessly unto you who were believing we were found to behave;
content_old: 10 Ye are witnesses—God also, How kindly and righteously and blamelessly unto you who were believing we were found to behave;

content: 11 Even as ye know how unto each one of you we were as a father unto his own children, Consoling you､ and soothing､ and calling to witness,—
content_old: 11 Even as ye know how unto each one of you we were as a father unto his own children, Consoling you､ and soothing､ and calling to witness,—

content: 12 To the end ye might be walking in a manner worthy of God､ who is calling you unto his own kingdom and glory.
content_old: 12 To the end ye might be walking in a manner worthy of God､ who is calling you unto his own kingdom and glory.

content: 13 And for this cause we are also giving thanks unto God unceasingly, That when ye received a spoken word from us—which was God’s Ye welcomed it— Not as a human word, But even as it truly is a divine word,— Which is also inwardly working itself in you who believe.
content_old: 13 And for this cause we are also giving thanks unto God unceasingly, That when ye received a spoken word from us—which was God’s Ye welcomed it— Not as a human word, But even as it truly is a divine word,— Which is also inwardly working itself in you who believe.

content: 14 For ye became imitators､ brethren､ of the assemblies of God which are in Judæa､ in Christ Jesus, In that the same things ye also suffered by your own fellow-countrymen､ even as they also by the Jews:—
content_old: 14 For ye became imitators､ brethren､ of the assemblies of God which are in Judæa､ in Christ Jesus, In that the same things ye also suffered by your own fellow-countrymen､ even as they also by the Jews:—

content: 15 Who have both slain the Lord Jesus—and the prophets, And us have persecuted, And unto God are displeasing, And unto all men are contrary,—
content_old: 15 Who have both slain the Lord Jesus—and the prophets, And us have persecuted, And unto God are displeasing, And unto all men are contrary,—

content: 16 Hindering us from speaking unto the nations that they might be saved､ To the filling up of their own sins continually; But anger hath overtaken them at length.
content_old: 16 Hindering us from speaking unto the nations that they might be saved､ To the filling up of their own sins continually; But anger hath overtaken them at length.

content: 17 Now we brethren having been bereaved away from you､ for the season of an hour,—in presence､ not in heart Gave more abundant diligence your face to behold with much longing;
content_old: 17 Now we brethren having been bereaved away from you､ for the season of an hour,—in presence､ not in heart Gave more abundant diligence your face to behold with much longing;

content: 18 Wherefore we desired to come unto you— Even I､ Paul, both once and again— And Satan thwarted us.
content_old: 18 Wherefore we desired to come unto you— Even I､ Paul, both once and again— And Satan thwarted us.

content: 19 For what shall be our hope､ or joy､ or crown of boasting? Shall not even ye､ before our Lord Jesus､ in his Presence?
content_old: 19 For what shall be our hope､ or joy､ or crown of boasting? Shall not even ye､ before our Lord Jesus､ in his Presence?

content: 1 Wherefore no longer concealing our anxiety We were well-pleased to be left in Athens alone,
content_old: 1 Wherefore no longer concealing our anxiety We were well-pleased to be left in Athens alone,

content: 2 And sent Timothy— Our brother､ and God’s minister in the glad-message of the Christ— That he might confirm and console you over your faith､
content_old: 2 And sent Timothy— Our brother､ and God’s minister in the glad-message of the Christ— That he might confirm and console you over your faith､

content: 3 That no one might be shrinking back in these tribulations. For ye yourselves know､ that hereunto are we appointed;
content_old: 3 That no one might be shrinking back in these tribulations. For ye yourselves know､ that hereunto are we appointed;

content: 4 For even when we were with you we told you beforehand— We are destined to suffer tribulation! Even as it also came to pass､ and ye know.
content_old: 4 For even when we were with you we told you beforehand— We are destined to suffer tribulation! Even as it also came to pass､ and ye know.

content: 5 For this cause I also no longer concealing my anxiety Sent､ that I might get to know your faith, Lest by any means he that tempteth should have tempted you､ And in vain should have been our toil.
content_old: 5 For this cause I also no longer concealing my anxiety Sent､ that I might get to know your faith, Lest by any means he that tempteth should have tempted you､ And in vain should have been our toil.

content: 6 But when just now Timothy came unto us､ from you, And brought us good tidings of your faith and love,— And that ye have good remembrance of us, Continually longing to see us—even as we also to see you
content_old: 6 But when just now Timothy came unto us､ from you, And brought us good tidings of your faith and love,— And that ye have good remembrance of us, Continually longing to see us—even as we also to see you

content: 7 For this cause were we consoled､ brethren､ over you, in all our necessity and tribulation､ through your faith;
content_old: 7 For this cause were we consoled､ brethren､ over you, in all our necessity and tribulation､ through your faith;

content: 8 Because now we live,—if only ye stand fast in the Lord.
content_old: 8 Because now we live,—if only ye stand fast in the Lord.

content: 9 For what thanksgiving can we render back unto God concerning you, On occasion of all the joy wherewith we rejoice､ for your sakes､ before our God?—
content_old: 9 For what thanksgiving can we render back unto God concerning you, On occasion of all the joy wherewith we rejoice､ for your sakes､ before our God?—

content: 10 Night and day making very abundant entreaties､ That we may see your face, and fit in the things which are lacking in your faith?
content_old: 10 Night and day making very abundant entreaties､ That we may see your face, and fit in the things which are lacking in your faith?

content: 11 Now may our God and Father himself and our Lord Jesus make straight our way unto you: And you may the Lord cause to abound and excel in your love one toward another and toward all,— Even as we do toward you:
content_old: 11 Now may our God and Father himself and our Lord Jesus make straight our way unto you: And you may the Lord cause to abound and excel in your love one toward another and toward all,— Even as we do toward you:

content: 12 To the end he may confirm your hearts､ faultless in holiness､
content_old: 12 To the end he may confirm your hearts､ faultless in holiness､

content: 1 For the rest, brethren, we request and exhort you､ in our Lord Jesus, That even as ye received from us､ how ye must needs walk and please God,— Even as ye also do walk That ye would abound still more.
content_old: 1 For the rest, brethren, we request and exhort you､ in our Lord Jesus, That even as ye received from us､ how ye must needs walk and please God,— Even as ye also do walk That ye would abound still more.

content: 2 For ye know what charges we gave you､ through the Lord Jesus.
content_old: 2 For ye know what charges we gave you､ through the Lord Jesus.

content: 3 For this is a thing willed of God, your sanctification,— That ye should abstain from unchastity,
content_old: 3 For this is a thing willed of God, your sanctification,— That ye should abstain from unchastity,

content: 4 That ye should know､ each one of you､ how of his own vessel to possess himself in sanctification and honour:
content_old: 4 That ye should know､ each one of you､ how of his own vessel to possess himself in sanctification and honour:

content: 5 Not with a passion of coveting､— Just as even the nations who know not God,—
content_old: 5 Not with a passion of coveting､— Just as even the nations who know not God,—

content: 6 Not over-reaching and defrauding､ in the matter､ his brother; Because an avenger is the Lord､ concerning all these things,— Even as we before told you､ and solemnly called you to witness.
content_old: 6 Not over-reaching and defrauding､ in the matter､ his brother; Because an avenger is the Lord､ concerning all these things,— Even as we before told you､ and solemnly called you to witness.

content: 7 For God did not call us､ with a permission of impurity, but in sanctification.
content_old: 7 For God did not call us､ with a permission of impurity, but in sanctification.

content: 8 Therefore､ indeed he that disregardeth— It is not a man he disregardeth, but God— Who giveth his Holy Spirit unto you.
content_old: 8 Therefore､ indeed he that disregardeth— It is not a man he disregardeth, but God— Who giveth his Holy Spirit unto you.

content: 9 But concerning brotherly love— No need have ye､ that we be writing unto you; For ye yourselves are God-taught to the loving of one another;—
content_old: 9 But concerning brotherly love— No need have ye､ that we be writing unto you; For ye yourselves are God-taught to the loving of one another;—

content: 10 And､ in fact､ ye are doing it unto all the brethren who are in the whole of Macedonia;— But we exhort you､ brethren､ to abound still more,
content_old: 10 And､ in fact､ ye are doing it unto all the brethren who are in the whole of Macedonia;— But we exhort you､ brethren､ to abound still more,

content: 11 And to be ambitious to be quiet､ And to be attending to your own affairs､ And to be working with your hands,— Even as unto you we gave charge—
content_old: 11 And to be ambitious to be quiet､ And to be attending to your own affairs､ And to be working with your hands,— Even as unto you we gave charge—

content: 12 That ye should walk reputably toward those without､ And of no one have need.
content_old: 12 That ye should walk reputably toward those without､ And of no one have need.

content: 13 But we do not wish you to be ignorant､ brethren､ concerning them who are falling asleep,— Lest ye be sorrowing､ even as the rest also､ who are without hope;
content_old: 13 But we do not wish you to be ignorant､ brethren､ concerning them who are falling asleep,— Lest ye be sorrowing､ even as the rest also､ who are without hope;

content: 14 For if we believe that Jesus died､ and rose again So also will God bring forth with him､ them who have fallen asleep through Jesus;
content_old: 14 For if we believe that Jesus died､ and rose again So also will God bring forth with him､ them who have fallen asleep through Jesus;

content: 15 For this unto you do we say､ by a word of the Lord,— That we､ the living who are left unto the Presence of the Lord Shall in nowise get before them who have fallen asleep;
content_old: 15 For this unto you do we say､ by a word of the Lord,— That we､ the living who are left unto the Presence of the Lord Shall in nowise get before them who have fallen asleep;

content: 16 Because the Lord himself With a word of command､ With a chief-messenger’s voice､ And with a trumpet of God Shall descend from heaven,— And the dead in Christ shall rise first,
content_old: 16 Because the Lord himself With a word of command､ With a chief-messenger’s voice､ And with a trumpet of God Shall descend from heaven,— And the dead in Christ shall rise first,

content: 17 After that we､ the living who are left Together with them shall be caught away､ in clouds､ to meet the Lord in the air;— And thus evermore､ with the Lord shall we be!
content_old: 17 After that we､ the living who are left Together with them shall be caught away､ in clouds､ to meet the Lord in the air;— And thus evermore､ with the Lord shall we be!

content: 1 But concerning the times and the seasons brethren,—ye have no need that unto you anything be written;
content_old: 1 But concerning the times and the seasons brethren,—ye have no need that unto you anything be written;

content: 2 For ye yourselves perfectly well know— That the day of the Lord as a thief in the night so cometh;
content_old: 2 For ye yourselves perfectly well know— That the day of the Lord as a thief in the night so cometh;

content: 3 As soon as they begin to say—Peace! and safety! Then suddenly､ upon them cometh destruction,— Just as the birth-throe unto her that is with child,— And in nowise shall they escape.
content_old: 3 As soon as they begin to say—Peace! and safety! Then suddenly､ upon them cometh destruction,— Just as the birth-throe unto her that is with child,— And in nowise shall they escape.

content: 4 But ye､ brethren are not in darkness､ that the day upon you､ as upon thieves should lay hold;
content_old: 4 But ye､ brethren are not in darkness､ that the day upon you､ as upon thieves should lay hold;

content: 5 For all ye are sons of light､ and sons of day,— We are not of night､ nor of darkness:
content_old: 5 For all ye are sons of light､ and sons of day,— We are not of night､ nor of darkness:

content: 6 Hence､ then､ let us not be sleeping as the rest, But let us watch and be sober:—
content_old: 6 Hence､ then､ let us not be sleeping as the rest, But let us watch and be sober:—

content: 7 For they that sleep by night do sleep, And they that drink by night do drink:—
content_old: 7 For they that sleep by night do sleep, And they that drink by night do drink:—

content: 8 But we being of the day let us be sober,— Putting on a breastplate of faith and love, And for helmet the hope of salvation.
content_old: 8 But we being of the day let us be sober,— Putting on a breastplate of faith and love, And for helmet the hope of salvation.

content: 9 Because God did not appoint us unto anger, But unto acquiring salvation through our Lord Jesus Christ:—
content_old: 9 Because God did not appoint us unto anger, But unto acquiring salvation through our Lord Jesus Christ:—

content: 10 Who died for us､ in order that Whether we be watching or sleeping Together with him we should live.
content_old: 10 Who died for us､ in order that Whether we be watching or sleeping Together with him we should live.

content: 11 Wherefore be consoling one another, and building up､ each the other,— Even as ye are also doing.
content_old: 11 Wherefore be consoling one another, and building up､ each the other,— Even as ye are also doing.

content: 12 Now we request you､ brethren,— To know them who are toiling among you､ and presiding over you､ in the Lord, and admonishing you;
content_old: 12 Now we request you､ brethren,— To know them who are toiling among you､ and presiding over you､ in the Lord, and admonishing you;

content: 13 And to hold them in very high esteem､ in love, their work’s sake. Be at peace among yourselves.
content_old: 13 And to hold them in very high esteem､ in love, their work’s sake. Be at peace among yourselves.

content: 14 But we exhort you, brethren— Admonish the disorderly､ Soothe them of little soul､ Help the weak､ Be longsuffering towards all:
content_old: 14 But we exhort you, brethren— Admonish the disorderly､ Soothe them of little soul､ Help the weak､ Be longsuffering towards all:

content: 15 See that none evil for evil､ unto any do render; But evermore､ what is good be pursuing､ towards one another､ and towards all:
content_old: 15 See that none evil for evil､ unto any do render; But evermore､ what is good be pursuing､ towards one another､ and towards all:

content: 16 Evermore rejoice､
content_old: 16 Evermore rejoice､

content: 17 Unceasingly pray､
content_old: 17 Unceasingly pray､

content: 18 In everything give thanks,— For this is a thing willed of God､ in Christ Jesus､ towards you:
content_old: 18 In everything give thanks,— For this is a thing willed of God､ in Christ Jesus､ towards you:

content: 19 The Spirit do not quench､
content_old: 19 The Spirit do not quench､

content: 20 Prophesyings do not despise,
content_old: 20 Prophesyings do not despise,

content: 21 But all things put to the proof— What is comely hold ye fast:
content_old: 21 But all things put to the proof— What is comely hold ye fast:

content: 22 From every form of wickedness abstain.
content_old: 22 From every form of wickedness abstain.

content: 23 But the God of peace himself hallow you completely, And entire might your spirit､ and soul､ and body,— So as to be unblameable in the Presence of our Lord Jesus Christ,— Be preserved!
content_old: 23 But the God of peace himself hallow you completely, And entire might your spirit､ and soul､ and body,— So as to be unblameable in the Presence of our Lord Jesus Christ,— Be preserved!

content: 24 Faithful is he that is calling you,— Who also will perform.
content_old: 24 Faithful is he that is calling you,— Who also will perform.

content: 25 Brethren! be praying for us also.
content_old: 25 Brethren! be praying for us also.

content: 26 Salute all the brethren with a holy kiss.
content_old: 26 Salute all the brethren with a holy kiss.

content: 27 I adjure you､ by the Lord､ that the letter be read unto all the brethren!
content_old: 27 I adjure you､ by the Lord､ that the letter be read unto all the brethren!
